committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks

official_title: A bill to modify the boundary of the Humboldt National Forest in the State of Nevada, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Modifies the exterior boundary of the Humboldt National Forest, Nevada. Adds to Humboldt National Forest all Federal lands within the modified boundary. Requires such lands to be administered as part of the National Forest. Treats the modified boundary of the National Forest as if it were the boundary of such Forest as of January 1, 1965.

titles.title: A bill to modify the boundary of the Humboldt National Forest in the State of Nevada, and for other purposes.
